name: Grav (itch) (Chadderbox)
description:
A open-ended puzzle game where you have a variety of options to complete the level.

*EVERY LEVEL CAN BE COMPLETED* Even if some objects fall through the map.

(Also try crouch jump or [LOOK UP + Q] to get to slightly higher areas) 

How does this relate to the theme of the jam? The gravity mechanic is a bug with my grab script, where you were supposed to pick something up (Which I have now made a new one for the game too), where instead of manipulating one object, it manipulated the world.
